mapper.insert: insert into db_purchasepayment (SID, SENDTIME, OPER, ACTIONMONEY, PURCHASETIME, PAYTYPE, PURCHASETIMESTR, EXPECTTIME, CREATEOPER, GROUPID, MONEYNEEDPAY, MONEYNOTPAY, SHIPNUM, PCMONEY, CHECKOPER, EXPRESSMONEY, MONEYPAIED, CHECKTIME, CREATETIME, MANUFACTUREID, RETURNMONEY, OPERTIME, MANUFACTURE, FLAG, PAYTIME, CONTENT) values (#{sid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sendtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{actionmoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{purchasetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{paytype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{purchasetimestr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{expecttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createoper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{groupid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{moneyneedpay,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{moneynotpay,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{shipnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pcmoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{checkoper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{expressmoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{moneypaied,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{checktime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{manufactureid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{returnmoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{manufacture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.select: select SID, SENDTIME, OPER, ACTIONMONEY, PURCHASETIME, PAYTYPE, PURCHASETIMESTR, EXPECTTIME, CREATEOPER, GROUPID, MONEYNEEDPAY, MONEYNOTPAY, SHIPNUM, PCMONEY, CHECKOPER, EXPRESSMONEY, MONEYPAIED, CHECKTIME, CREATETIME, MANUFACTUREID, RETURNMONEY, OPERTIME, MANUFACTURE, FLAG, PAYTIME, CONTENT from db_purchasepayment
